hero.title: Connect your local business with international partners
hero.subtitle: The platform that facilitates business partnerships between Cameroonian companies and foreign investors

card_local.title: For local businesses
card_local.desc: Access equipment, financing, market outlets and advice to grow your business and reach new markets.

card_foreign.title: For foreign partners
card_foreign.desc: Discover promising investment opportunities and collaborate with dynamic Cameroonian companies.

card_targeting.title: Precise targeting
card_targeting.desc: Find exactly what you need thanks to our intelligent navigation system by domains and sectors.

steps.title: Choose a domain
steps.desc: Select from 8 strategic domains: Equipment, Financing, Market Outlets, Packaging, Raw Materials, Knowledge Sharing, Advisory Support, Training

steps.title: Specify your need
steps.desc: Browse sub-domains to refine your search according to your specific needs and identify ideal partners

steps.title: Contact companies
steps.desc: Access full company contact details and initiate mutually beneficial partnerships

cta.title: Ready to grow your business?
cta.subtitle: Join our community of entrepreneurs and investors now

error.title: Oops! An error occurred
error.subtitle: Something isn't working as expected
error.description: We apologize for the inconvenience. Our team has been notified and is working to resolve the issue. In the meantime, you can return to the homepage or go back to the previous page.

header.title: Create an account
header.subtitle: Choose the registration type that suits you. Join our platform to develop your business partnerships and access new opportunities.

local.title: Local company
local.subtitle: Based in Cameroon
local.description: Create your company profile, publish your needs and connect with international partners to grow your business.

bullet.kyc: Create your company profile with secure KYC verification
bullet.publish_needs: Publish your needs (financing, equipment, raw materials, etc.)
bullet.visible_to_foreign: Be visible to foreign companies and investors
bullet.access_opportunities: Access partnership opportunities and advisory support

local.cta_more_aria: More information about local company registration

foreign.title: Foreign company
foreign.subtitle: International partner
foreign.description: Suppliers, equipment providers, financiers or consultants: collaborate with dynamic Cameroonian companies and access new markets.

bullet.secure_process: Secure process with fast verification and approval
bullet.upload_offers: Upload your documents and showcase your equipment offers
bullet.access_profiles: Access detailed profiles of local companies
bullet.propose_services: Offer your services and initiate collaborations

foreign.cta_more_aria: More information about foreign company registration

additional.title: Why register on our platform?
additional.description: Our platform facilitates connections between local and international companies. Benefit from a secure process, increased visibility and growth opportunities tailored to your needs.
